TopicTitle: Quick guide for those who want to make parts with mirrored symmetry.

Articles.Content:
Recently I fixed an issue with one of my parts that needed to be placed with mirrored symmetry, so I thought I'd share! 

You can use this method to avoid your created parts being flipped upside down when placed with symmetry in the SPH.

[Link to the Album](http://imgur.com/a/kUPsg)
